attributes.title: THIS APP DESERVES NEGATIVE STARS
attributes.review: I downloaded this for my lord and savior Donald J Trumpy poo and I was appalled by this. APPALLED! I was spammed with called and unwanted messages, I felt like I was being watched by a Pervy, orange, old, pumpkin of a president. In the end, I did not like it. It was a trash app, I felt like I was in 2014 with old, trash apps... I then bought tickets to go see him and couldn’t go to the rally because I was getting aborted and then this app kept sending me notifications during my abortion... It disrupted my self abortion and I feel like I’m being watched... STEWPID APP

attributes.title: 🤢🤢 IM ABOUT TO CRY
attributes.review: I have been a trump supporter since 2016, but this just changed the way that I thought, I downloaded the app to were they asked for my phone number, as soon as that happened, my phone started to get a bunch of texts and calls from this app, my phone started to glitch extremely bad. I now have to get a new iphone. This has also made me see the way he thinks, which is horrible!! Those poor kids in those ice camps!!!! Trump supporters do a thing for us all and VOTE FOR BIDENNN!!!!

attributes.title: Puts safety at risk
attributes.review: i know most of the bad reviews are fake and tying to get the app removed, but i truly have some issues with the app. i would love to support trump any way i can, including using this app. but i’m seriously concerned that it puts my safety (and other users safety) at risk. the app requests to read my contacts, and know my precise location. it also requested to know my phone status and identity. after that i decided i needed to delete the app right away. please fix this.

attributes.title: Disappointed.
attributes.review: I downloaded this app so excited to get closer with MY president. I am sorry to say that I am nothing short of absolutely disappointed. It’s a disappointment to America, the presidency, and the people who fought for it. I really thought that mr president would have worked harder to have an app under HIS name be worthy. I experienced glitches and it took forever to load up the screen. I couldn’t even sign up with my email for anything. So utterly disappointed. Do better.

attributes.title: Heaven?
attributes.review:
Okay so I downloaded the app and at first it seemed fine but then I heard barking outside➿ I was confused cause, my cats don’t bark🙀 so I opened the door 🚪 and with my eyes 👀 I saw my dog 🐶 that’s been dead for years 🌂 very confused I was and then as I looked closely I could see👁👁 
An American flag was taped to her back saying trump 2020🙈 so then I took my dog to the vet 👩🏽‍⚕️ figured my poor dog who’d been abused by political standards and forcefully brought back to life deserved to be happy with god so off I sent her👼🏻 rip Brownie, again😔

attributes.title: THIS APP KIDNAPPED MY GRANDMA
attributes.review: This app took a month to download ✨ once it did I got a phone call 🥰 once I answered it I heard “If yõu want yõûr grãndmã come to thē whįtë hõùsė” so I went to The White House only to find a giant Cheeto with soggy hair but when I put my glasses on I was in shock to find that it wasn’t a faint Cheeto but Donald trump! I said give me back my grandma but he said that first I would have to help him bomd China. I was in complete shock but I had a plan to get my grandma out of there. I lured him into his office using a child sized doll while me and my grandma escaped ✨

attributes.title: IM OFFENDED THIS APP IS SO BAD
attributes.review: Ummmm so basically this app has ruined my life. As soon as I got the app my dog died and I got really hungry and fell down the stairs and my parents told me they didn’t love me and my friends stopped talking to me and my fictional boyfriend broke my heart. This app was the reason my life fell apart. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP IT WILL HURT YOUR LIFE TOO. RUN RUN RUN RUN. RUN. RUN. RUN. RUN. WHY DOES THIS APP EXIST 😭😭 please save yourself (and tiktok) and DO NOT download this app. Why why why why why why why why why why why why why why why why does it exist. Holy cow I cannot stress this enough #SAVETIKTOK

attributes.title: a karen’s perspective
attributes.review: i used this app and my oh my was it horrible! after opening it my house turned into one big trump sign. everywhere i looked it said trump 2020 and keep america great. don’t get me wrong i’m 100% a karen who loves trump and hates workers, but this was CRAZY. i would really like to speak to the manager of this app and i have already written many emails to tech support hoping to reach their manager. 10/10 recommend talking to the manager, 10/10 recommend NOT downloading this app.

attributes.title: Trump app was less successful than my love life
attributes.review: I downloaded this and expected to find barrons address and contact information, which I did, but he did not respond accordingly. This app, similar to Barron, made empty promises. He said he’d love me for infinity then left me for his older sister. I knew I would never be good enough. What he doesn’t know is I’m pregnant with his twins and I’m only 11 years old. If I were to improve the app I would add a child support section. I think I may get an abortion.

attributes.title: i feel attacked
attributes.review: when i first got the app it was all fine and dandy UNTIL one day when two men wearing black suits and sunglasses came to my door. they told me they wanted to talk, but when i refused they put a pair of plus size lululemon leggings over my head. i was taken to an abandoned house somewhere in a cornfield. they asked me if i support trump and when i said i wasn’t old enough to vote they kicked me straight in the teeth. i bled out until i eventually passed on to the gods. don’t get the app.
